original_text: The Lord hath also a controversy with Judah, and will punish Jacob according to his ways; according to his doings will he recompense him.
korean_text: 여호와께서 유다와 논쟁하시고 야곱을 그 행실대로 벌하시며 그의 행위대로 그에게 보응하시리라

sentences.original_text: The Lord hath also a controversy with Judah
and will punish Jacob according to his ways
according to his doings will he recompense him
